select re_no, no, emp_name, content, regdate from re_media where no = #{no} order by to_number(re_no) asc

insert into re_media(re_no, no, emp_no, emp_name, content, regdate) values(re_media_seq.nextval, #{no}, #{emp_no}, #{emp_name}, #{content}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
